actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to allow the Corps of Engineers to use certain amounts to carry out harbor deepening projects.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to prioritize the use of amounts made available to the Secretary for general investigations to carry out harbor deepening projects.

titles.title: A bill to allow the Corps of Engineers to use certain amounts to carry out harbor deepening projects.
